name: Best Ever Smashed Potatoes
description: These best ever smashed potatoes are ready in just 15 minutes and are bursting with flavour. Try any of the delicious combinations below—one recipe, so many ways.

ingredients.name: medium, unpeeled potatoes or sweet potatoes
3 Onion Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or dip mix of your choice

ingredients.name: Pesto Sauce
ingredients.additionalInstruction: prepared, or salad dressing, your choice

preparation: Combine potatoes and dip mix in a Multipurpose Steamer.
Microwave on high, with lid on, for 10 minutes.
Mash potatoes with milk and finishing sauce until desired consistency.
tips: • 3 Onion Dip Mix with Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing
• Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning + Sesame Ginger Dressing
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 protein serving, and 1 cup steamed veggies.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning (Pkg of 3)
summary: A Greek-inspired meal, souvlaki is marinated meat grilled on a skewer, often served with warm pita bread and tzatziki. No grill? No problem. Skip the skewers and put your Sheet Pan to work to make equally tasty Chicken Souvlaki in 20 minutes in the oven.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.
